original_text: The Lord spoke to Moses in the wilderness of Sinai, in the tent of meeting, on the first day of the second month, in the second year after they had come out of the land of Egypt, saying,
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 애굽 땅에서 나온 후 둘째 해 둘째 달 첫째 날에 여호와께서 시내 광야 회막에서 모세에게 말씀하여 이르시되

sentences.original_text: on the first day of the second month,
in the second year after they had come out of the land of Egypt,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 애굽 땅에서 나온 지 두 번째 해에
